Name: 廃村巡り | Haisonmeguri
About the game: This game is a first-person J-horror game. The setting of this game is created in the image of an abandoned village in Japan. GAME SYSTEM This game is a 'walking simulator'. The game screen is generally darkened to create a frightening atmosphere. It is recommended to darken the room and play with headphones. This game does not support English.
